post.text: When Trump and Pence attack Planned Parenthood, they're attacking millions of Americans.

comment.author: Derek
comment.text: I will bet one thousand dollars that Hillary Clinton loses the election. I will make this bet with any takers as many times as I can. We will both put our money in a 3rd parties hand so no matter what happens there's no foul play. Who wants to try and take my money?

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: better start saving your money Clinton is up 7 points I would hate to take money from a man who believes in groping women and raping children

replies.author: Derek
replies.text: Clinton is up "7 points" in extremely biased polls with a +/- of up to 5 points. If you were so sure of your candidates ability to win you would put your money where your mouth is. Put up or shut up. Or, do you have to wait until your next government handout check comes before you have the money?

replies.author: Amy
replies.text: You are correct extremely biased polls and it wouldnt surprise me that they are trying to fool.the american people because they want to rig the election trump will win who in there right mind would ever vote for someone who is as crooked as her
